fullplot: A drama set in the American South, where a precocious, troubled girl finds a safe haven in the music and movement of Elvis Presley.
plot: A drama set in the American South, where a precocious, troubled girl finds a safe haven in the music and movement of Elvis Presley.
title: Hounddog

tomatoes.consensus: Despite a noble effort from Dakota Fanning, Hounddog is overwrought, cliche-ridden and downright exploitative.
